commits.message:
We need to release via jenkins, with customm suffix for tag and pom version

We need to relese via jenkins, with customm suffix for tags and pom's version. Not sure releaseBranchVersionSuffix behaviour. It is only suffix the release branch name. I've added another propery releaseVersionTagSuffix for this.

We need to relese via jenkins, with customm suffix for tag and pom version

We need to relese via jenkins, with customm suffix for tags and pom's version. Not sure releaseBranchVersionSuffix behaviour. It is only suffix the release branch name. I've added another propery releaseVersionTagSuffix for this.

description.raw: Hi, we need to release via jenkins in one step automatic command. Not sure for the behaviour of releaseBranchVersionSuffix. I think it is only suffix the releases branch name. i've added another property to suffix the Tags and Pom's versions releaseVersionTagSuffix. Maybe we can use releaseBranchVersionSuffix to achieve this?
description.html: Hi, we need to release via jenkins in one step automatic command. Not sure for the behaviour of releaseBranchVersionSuffix. I think it is only suffix the releases branch name. i've added another property to suffix the Tags and Pom's versions releaseVersionTagSuffix. Maybe we can use releaseBranchVersionSuffix to achieve this?

title.raw: Custom suffix for tags and POM's version
title.html: Custom suffix for tags and POM's version

Maybe we can use releaseBranchVersionSuffix to achieve this?

commits.message:
We need to relese via jenkins, with customm suffix for tag and pom version

We need to relese via jenkins, with customm suffix for tags and pom's version. Not sure releaseBranchVersionSuffix behaviour. It is only suffix the release branch name. I've added another propery releaseVersionTagSuffix for this.

pullrequest.title: Custom suffix for tags and POM's version

content.raw: If `tagSuffix`is null, then the four characters "null" are appended.
content.html: If tagSuffixis null, then the four characters "null" are appended.

pullrequest.title: Custom suffix for tags and POM's version
Custom suffix for tags and POM's version

content.raw: we are not preserving original functionality of `ReleaseBranchVersionSuffix`. We should.
content.html: we are not preserving original functionality of ReleaseBranchVersionSuffix. We should.

pullrequest.title: Custom suffix for tags and POM's version

content.raw: the functionality is preserved with this new tags. Maybe i've misunderstood the behavior of that property.
content.html: the functionality is preserved with this new tags. Maybe i've misunderstood the behavior of that property.

pullrequest.title: Custom suffix for tags and POM's version

content.raw: I've found a better way to achieve  this without breaking anything. DefaultPomUpdater already has a method that was doing this stuff.
content.html: I've found a better way to achieve this without breaking anything. DefaultPomUpdater already has a method that was doing this stuff.

pullrequest.title: Custom suffix for tags and POM's version

content.raw: Exactly matches what am looking for. Can this be expedited? @PaoloPiccinini @mariopapandrea
content.html: Exactly matches what am looking for. Can this be expedited? @PaoloPiccinini @mariopapandrea

pullrequest.title: Custom suffix for tags and POM's version

content.raw: For the Atlassian repository we dont know if they want to merge it. You can release this version on your local artifactory and use it. You should merge this stuff on master branch before deploy it. Ive branched from develop and i dont know if its stable. @inspiregates
content.html: For the Atlassian repository we dont know if they want to merge it. You can release this version on your local artifactory and use it. You should merge this stuff on master branch before deploy it. Ive branched from develop and i dont know if its stable. @inspiregates
